sen.j: 含利門（がんりもん）は、大内裏豊楽院十九門のひとつである。
sen.e: Ganrimon was one of the 19 gates of Buraku-in Daidairi Palace.
Ganri-mon Gate was one of the 19 gates of the Buraku-in (Reception Compound) of the Daidairi (Greater Imperial Palace).
Ganri-mon Gate was one of the 19 gates of the Buraku-in (Reception Compound) of the Daidairi (Greater Imperial Palace).

sen.j: 延英堂の北廊の廂門である。
sen.e: it is a hisashimon (gate with a canopy) located in the north gallery of Enei-do Hall.
sen.cmt: 廂門→定訳不明：hisashimon (gate with a canopy)としました。
sen.e: It is a hisashimon (gate with a canopy) located in the north gallery of Enei-do Hall.
It is a hisashimon (gate with a canopy) located in the north gallery of Enei-do Hall.

sen.j: 一部の図版には、延英堂の北廊を築地とするものがあるが、それは後世の簡略されたた制を描いたものである。
sen.e: In some of the drawings, instead of the north gallery of Enei-do Hall, a tsuiji (a mud wall covered with a roof) appears, because they are the drawings made in later days after the structure had been simplified.
sen.cmt: （簡略された）た制→入力ミスのようです。 Structureを補いました。
sen.e: Some illustrations depict the north gallery of Enei-do Hall as a tsuiji (a mud wall covered with a roof) but these are simplified illustrations that were created later.
sen.cmt: 原文を反映するように再構成しました
sen.e: Some illustrations depict the north gallery of Enei-do Hall as a tsuiji (a mud wall covered with a roof) but these are simplified illustrations that were created later.

sen.j: もとは北廊があり、観徳堂の南廊に接し、その中間に含利門があった。
sen.e: Originally there existed a north gallery, which connected to the south gallery of Kantoku-do Hall, and the gate, Ganrimon was located in between.
There was originally north gallery which was connected to the south gallery of Kantoku-do Hall, and Ganri-mon Gate located in between these.
There was originally north gallery which was connected to the south gallery of Kantoku-do Hall, and Ganri-mon Gate located in between these.

sen.j: また一部図版に北廊の門を開明門とするものもあるがこれもまた誤りである。
sen.e: There are also some drawings, in which the gate on the north gallery is indicated as Kaimeimon, but it is also erroneous.
There are also illustrations in which the gate on the north gallery is depicted as Kaimei-mon Gate but these are also incorrect.
sen.cmt: 読みやすくするように再構成しました
sen.e: There are also illustrations in which the gate on the north gallery is depicted as Kaimei-mon Gate but these are also incorrect.
